actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit Members of the Congress from using official congressional stationery in mass mailings for any purpose other than official congressional business.

summary.text: Prohibits any Member of Congress from using official congressional stationery for mass mailings for any purpose other than official congressional business. Establishes a penalty for violation of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit Members of the Congress from using official congressional stationery in mass mailings for any purpose other than official congressional business.
